decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to flood the board with low-cost white creatures and use various spells and abilities to generate tokens and protect them. The deck focuses on maintaining a relentless offensive pressure through aggressive attacking with multiple small creatures, while also providing some card draw and life gain to outlast opponents. The efficient use of resources and the synergy between the cards in the deck allow for consistent and powerful plays that overwhelm opponents in Pauper 1 vs 1 matches.
